texts.en: Maria is 54 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and daughter. She owns a small store, which is located in her home. Maria has owned the business for approximately 12 years and its sales have enabled her to get ahead. She is requesting a loan to purchase soups, eggs, basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, etc. and thus be able to improve her earnings and her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase soups, eggs, basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Jose Vitelio

texts.es: Jose de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el posee un taller de costura  desde hace aproximadamente 15 años, tiene muchos clientes por la calidad con que elabora la ropa, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias es como ha logra salir adelante con su familia, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de botones, tela, hilos,  zippers y otros accesorios para la costura y así el podrá seguir atendiendo mejor a sus clientes y obtener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Jose is 45 years old and he lives in his own home with his wife and children. He has had a sewing shop for approximately 15 years. He has a lot of customers because of the quality of the clothes he makes. With his earnings, he is able to get ahead with his family. He is asking for a loan to buy buttons, fabric, zippers and other accessories for sewing. This way, he can continue serving his customers better and obtain better income.

loans.use: to buy buttons, fabric, thread, zippers and other accessories for sewing.

loans.name: Damverosa

texts.en:
As a single parent of five children, Damverosa works hard to support her family.

She has a weaving business in the Philippines, and also earns an additional income from food vending. Damverosa is borrowing 9,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional fiber and other materials for her business.

Damverosa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, which is to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fiber and other materials for her business

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Jennifer is 39 years old and both of her children are in school.

Jennifer has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Jennifer has been in this business for three years. In the future, Jennifer would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Gina is 35 years old and all of her children are in school.

Gina has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Gina requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Gina has been in this business for two years. In the future, Gina would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Judith Marlin

texts.en:
Judith Marlin is 48 years old and widowed with eight children. With four of her children in school, Judith Marlin works very hard to provide for them.

Judith Marlin runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like junk foods, canned goods, beverages, home care products and other groceries.

Judith Marlin has been in this business for five years now. 

In the future, Judith Marlin would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like junk foods, canned goods, beverages, home care products and other groceries

loans.name: Daylin

texts.en:
Daylin is 45 years old and married with three children.

She runs a business raising pigs.  Daylin has been in this business for 16 years and earns additional income from her general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian is 42 years old and married with six children. With three of her children in school, Lilian works very hard to provide for them.

Lilian runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, junk foods, beverages, personal care products and other groceries.

Lilian has been in this business for two years now. 

In the future, Lilian would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, junk foods, beverages, personal care products and other groceries

loans.name: Bibi

texts.ru:
Биби  трудолюбивая и жизнерадостная женщина 50 лет. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. Она более шести лет  сотрудничает с МДО Арванд.. Биби многие годы занимается торговлей в рынке «Бадахшон». Она продает детские  игрушки, необходимые швейные принадлежности, канцелярские товары и многое другое. Её сын помогает её в торговле. Её муж работает сварщиком. 
Она очень благодарна  МДО Арванд. Потому что с помощью  Арванда она расширила свой бизнес.  Биби подала заявку на кредит. Она хочет расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en:
Bibi is a hard-working and cheerful 50-year-old woman. She is married and has two children. She has been working with MDO Arvand for over six years. For many years, Bibi has traded at the "Badakhshon" market. She sells children's toys, essential sewing accessories, stationery goods and much more. Her son helps her in her business. Her husband works as a welder.

She is very grateful to MDO Arvand, because with Arvand's help she has expanded her business. Bibi has applied for a loan to further increase her business.

loans.use: to buy goods for retail.

loans.name: Gilberto De Jesus

texts.es: Gilberto de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijas, el se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de granos básicos y también trabaja como obrero en una cooperativa, tiene 20 años de dedicarse a la actividad agrícola, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos y controles de plagas, para poder tener una buena cosecha y asi tener mejores ingresos para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gilberto is 45 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and their three daughters. He earns a living form agriculture, cultivating basic grains; and he also works in a cooperative business. 

He has worked in agriculture for 20 years, and with the money he makes from this he is able to settle his household bills.

He is asking for a loan in order to buy seeds, fertilisers and pest controls, to be able to have a better harvest and therefore more income, from which he will be able to improve the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilisers, and pest controls

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijas, ella posee una tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 2 años, vende durante todo el años y tiene muchos clientes, con las ventas que ella realiza es como ha podido salir adelante, Julia esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de sopas, pan dulce, jabón, granos básicos,  leche, refrescos, entre otras cosas, y asi poder surtir su tienda y darle a sus hijas una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Julia is a single mother. She lives in her own house with her two daughters and has had a store, located in her house, for the past 2 years. She makes her sales during the whole year and has many customers. With the sales that she makes, she has been able to get ahead. Julia is asking for a loan to purchase soups, sweet bread, soap, basic grain, milk, soft drinks and other things, and to be able to stock her store and give her daughters a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase soups, sweet bread, soap, basic grains, milk, soft drinks, and other things.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Maria de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de carteras y bolsones su esposo es empleado y le ayuda en los gastos del hogar, y asi es como pueden salir adelante, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda colocando el techo en la parte de atrás de la casa pero como no posee capital está solicitando un crédito para la compra de laminas, polines y pago de mano de obra asi ella y su familia puedan vivir más seguros y cómodos.
texts.en: Maria, 53 years old, lives in her own house with her two children and her husband. She works selling hand bags and school bags. Her husband is employed and helps her with the household expenses, and in this way they are able to get ahead. She wants to improve her house, installing a roof on the back part of the house but as she doesn't have capital, she is asking for a loan to purchase metal sheeting, beams, and pay labor costs so that she and her family can live more securely and comfortably.

loans.use: to purchase metal sheeting, beams, and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Reyna Claribel

texts.es: Reyna de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijas, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, desde hace 2 años la cual inicio con capital propio, gracias a sus ventas y con la ayuda que le brinda su esposo es como pueden salir adelante con los gastos del hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería como granos básicos, sopas, azúcar, golosinas, refrescos, todo por mayor y asi poder surtir su tienda para poder generar mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Reyna, 36 years old, lives in her own house with her husband and their two daughters. She has a small store located in her home, which she undertook 2 years ago with her own capital. Thanks to her sales and with the help that her husband offers her, she can get ahead with the household expenses. She is asking for a loan to purchase more merchandise such as basic grains, soups, sugar, sweets, soft drinks, all in bulk, and in this way be able to stock her store to be able to generate more earnings.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise such as basic grains, soups, sugar, sweets, soft drinks, all in bulk.

loans.name: Yudira Suleyma

texts.es: Yudira de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella posee una venta de verduras y pollos por libras, su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su casa en una zona muy transitada desde hace 15 años, y tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante con sus hijas, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de pollos y verduras por mayor y asi poder tener mas productos para tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Yudira is 34 years old and she lives in her own home with her three children. Her business is selling chicken and vegetables by the pound, and it is located near her home in a very busy zone.

She's done this work for fifteen years and  has many clients due to her good prices. With the income from this work, she can get ahead with her daughters.

She is requesting the loan to buy chicken and vegetables at wholesale so that she can have a greater quantity to sell and earn more.

loans.use: to buy chickens and vegetables at wholesale.

loans.name: Maria Flora

texts.es: Maria de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hija, ella posee una tienda y venta de comida típica, tiene 10 años de tener el negocio el cual inicio con capital propio, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de granos básicos, sopas, azúcar, refrescos, leche en polvo, etc. todo por mayor para poder hacer crecer su negocio y asi tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Maria, 36 years old, lives in her own house with her life partner and their daughter. She has a store and sells typical food. She has had the business for 10 years, which she began with her own capital. With the sales that she makes, she manages to cover some of the household expenses. She is asking for a loan to purchase basic grains, soups, sugar, soft drinks, powdered milk, etc., all in bulk, to be able to grow her business and in this way have better earnings.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, soups, sugar, soft drinks, powdered milk, etc., all in bulk.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana es una mujer de 39 años de edad, es casada tiene una linda familia de ocho hijos de las edades entre 1 y  21 años. Esta linda familia vive en una comunidad de San Antonio Palopo Sololá.
Juana con el afán de generar sus ingresos y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa, se dedica a la elaboración de ropa típica.
Juana junto a su esposo han empezado la construcción de su casa, aunque ellos ahora ya no cuentan con el dinero necesario para poder terminar la construcción, pero para Juana es muy importante finalizar la construcción, para que sus hijos tengan una mejor vida, entonces han decidido solicitar un prestamo para comprar cemento, hierro, block.
 El gran sueño de Juana es terminar la construcción de su casa antes de la época de lluvia que ya se acerca.
texts.en:
Juana is a 39-year-old woman. She is married and has a lovely family of 8 children between the ages of 1 and 21. This lovely family lives in a community in San Antonio Palopo, Sololá.

Juana, with the desire to generate income and support her husband with the household expenses, works making traditional clothing.

Juana, along with her husband, has begun the construction of their house. Although they now don't have the money needed to be able to finish the construction, for Juana it is very important to finish the construction so that their children have a better life. So, they have decided to ask for a loan to purchase cement, iron, and concrete blocks.

Juana's great dream is to finish the construction of her house before the rainy season, which is approaching.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron and concrete blocks.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Maria de 45 años de edad es divorciada  vive en casa propia con su hija, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal, su negocio está ubicado en el mercado municipal que está cerca de su casa, tiene muchos clientes por la variedad de productos y los buenos preciso, con las ventas que realiza logra sacar adelante a su hija quien estudia todavía, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos como cosméticos, esmaltes, ganchos para el cabello, shampoo, tientes para el cabello, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Maria, 45 years old, is divorced and lives in her own house with her daughter. She works selling personal products. Her business is located in the municipal market that is near her house. She has many customers due to the variety of products and the good prices. With the sales she makes, she manages to get her daughter ahead, who is still in school. She is asking for a loan to purchase more products such as cosmetics, nail polish, hair clips, shampoo, hair dye, etc. and in this way be able to have better income.

loans.use: to purchase more products such as cosmetics, nail polish, hair clips, shampoo, hair dye, etc.

loans.name: Patricia Guadalupe

texts.es: Patricia de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de empanadas desde hace 20 años, gracias a las ventas que ella realiza y a al ayuda de su esposo han podido salir adelante, ella quiere seguir mejorando su vivienda colocando el piso, repellando las paredes entre otras cosas pero como no posee de suficiente capital tomo la decisión de solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar los materiales necesarios como arena, cemento, cerámica entre otra cosas y si poco a poco ir remodelando su casa para tener una vivienda digna.
texts.en: Patricia, 34 years old, lives in her own house with her husband. She has worked selling empanadas for the past 20 years. Thanks to the sales that she makes, and the help of her husband, they have been able to get ahead. She wants to continue improving her house, installing the floor, replastering the walls, among other things, but she doesn't have sufficient capital. She decided to ask INTEGRAL fro a loan to be able to purchase the necessary materials such as sand, cement, ceramic tiles, among other things, and little by little remodel her house to have a respectable dwelling.

loans.use: to purchase the needed materials such as sand, cement, ceramic tiles and other things.

loans.name: Erick Salvador

texts.es: Erick de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijas, el posee un taller de reparación de productos electrónicos desde hace 10 años el cual está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, gracias a su trabajo es como el puede salir adelante en su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar todos los instrumentos necesarios para seguir con su trabajo como electrodos, cobre, estaño, entre otras cosas y asi poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Erick is 39 years old and he lives in his own home with his three daughters. He has an electronic repair shop located at home. He's been doing this work for ten years, and it is how he supports his household.

He is requesting the loan to buy shop instruments and supplies such as electrodes, copper, tin, and more. This will allow him to continue his work, which is his only source of income.

loans.use: to buy electrodes, copper, tin, and more.

loans.name: Sadoqat

texts.ru:
Садокат  родилась в семье дехканина. Ей 31 лет. Она не замужем. Она живет вместе с матерью  и сестрой .  Садокат   очень жизнерадостная женщина и уважаемый человек в кругу близких. Садокат очень красивая  и трудолюбивая женщина. Садокат диллер в сотовой компании. Она занимается куплей продажей  сим-карт и предоставляет дилерские услуги. 
Садокат  обратилась в Арванд за кредитом. Она хочет купить компьютер для своего дилерского центра. Заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Sadokat was born into a family of farmers. She is 31 years old. She is unmarried. She lives together with her mother and sister. Sadokat is a very cheerful woman, and respected amongst those who know her. Sadokat is a very beautiful and hardworking woman. 

Sadokat is a dealer in a cell phone company. She is involved in the sale and purchase of sim cards, and offers dealer services. Sadokat has applied to Arvand for a loan. She wants to buy a computer for her dealership. She thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Hector

texts.es:
Héctor es ahora un hombre de 34 años de edad, él se encuentra muy satisfecho porque gracias  al crédito anterior el logro comprar sus insumos agrícolas y obtuvo muy buena cosecha, gracias a las ganancias que le genero esta cosecha el logro remodelar su casa  y también su cultivo ha ido incrementando.  Él ahora solicita un nuevo préstamo  para poder comprar sus semillas de zanahoria y fertilizantes.
El gran sueño de Héctor es poder repellas las paredes de su casa.
texts.en:
Héctor is now a 34-year-old man. He is very satisfied because, thanks to the previous loan, he managed to purchase his agricultural supplies and got a very good harvest. Thanks to the earnings that this harvest generated for him, he managed to remodel his house and also his cultivation has increased. He now is asking for a new loan to be able to purchase his carrot seeds and fertilizer.

Héctor's great dream is to be able to replaster the walls of his house.

loans.use: to purchase carrot seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Ana Ofelia

texts.es: Doña Ana de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la siembra de maíz  y crianza de cerdos, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, productos de controles de plagas y mochila rociadoras para que pueda tener una mejor cosecha y asi tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Ana is 51 years old, and she lives in her own home with her family. She earns a living growing corn and raising pigs, and through this work she is able to meet some of the household expenses.

Ana is requesting the loan to buy fertilizers, compost, plague control products, and a backpack sprayer. This will allow her to get a better harvest and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, compost, plague control products and a backpack sprayer.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 26 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la crianza de pollos y a la siembra de maíz tiene 5 años de dedicarse a esa actividad, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en su casa con los gastos y también en sus gastos personales, el joven vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de  mas pollos e insumos agrícolas para el cultivo de maíz y asi poder continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: The young man, whose face has been pixelated because he is 26 years old and lives in a high-risk zone, works raising chickens and growing corn. He has been doing this work for 5 years. With what he gets from his sales, he helps in his house with the expenses and also with his personal expenses. The young man lives in his own house with his family. He is asking for a loan to purchase more chickens and agricultural supplies to grow corn and in this way be able to continue with his work since it is his only source of income.

loans.use: to purchase more chickens and agricultural supplies to grow corn.

loans.name: Tamanno

texts.ru:
Таманно молодая девушка 1990 года рождения. Она  замужем и имеет одного ребёнка. Она  работает в дехканском хозяйстве «Пайравчон» более 3 года. Её муж в данный момент работает таксистом. Они живут вместе с родителями. Таманно мечтает о собственном доме, но все что они зарабатывают уходит на жизнь, и не получается накопить для покупки дома.  Её муж собирается уехать  в Россию, чтобы заработать на собственный дом.  
Таманно   обратилась  в МДО Арванд за кредитом. Она хочет получить кредит для покупки билета своему мужу. Она заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Tamanno is a young woman born in 1990. She is married, with one child. She has been working on a dehkan farm “Payravchon” for over 3 years. Her husband currently works as a taxi driver. They live together with parents. Tamanno is dreaming of her own house, but all their earnings are spend on everyday expenses, and they are unable to save money for a house. Her husband wants to go to Russia to make enough money for their own house.

Tamanno requested a loan through MDO Arvand. She wants to use the money to buy a plane ticket for her husband. She thanks Arvand in advance for their assistance.

loans.use: to buy a ticket

loans.name: Mirna Marisol

texts.es: Mirna de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre, ella se dedica a la venta de comida típica (tamales, yuca, papas, pastelitos de carnes, etc.) tiene 10 años de dedicarse a las ventas y gracias a su trabajo es como ha podido salir adelante, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de materia prima como maíz, papas, yucas, verduras, aceite carnes entre otros ingredientes y asi poder continuar con sus ventas para tener junto con  su madre un mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Mirna, 40 years old, lives in her own house with her mother. She works selling traditional food (tamales, yucca, potatoes, meat pies, etc.). She has been working in the sales for 10 years and, thanks to her work, is how she has been able to get ahead. She is asking for a loan to purchase raw material such as corn, potatoes, yucca, vegetables, oil, meat, and other ingredients and in this way be able to continue with her sales to be able to have a better quality of life with her mother.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials such as corn, potatoes, yucca, vegetables, oil, meat and other ingredients.

loans.name: Noel De Jesus

texts.es: Noel de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica a la crianza de ganado y al cultivo de maíz, tiene 15 años de dedicarse a esa actividad, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, gracias a las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ganado bovino para continuar con la crianza y asi tener mejores ingresos económicos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Noel, 35 years old, lives in his own house with his family. He works raising cattle and growing corn, He has been doing this work for 15 years. He sells his products in the areas near where he lives. Thanks to the sales he makes, he manages to cover some of the household expenses. He is asking for a loan to purchase cattle to continue with raising them and in this way have better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijas, el se dedica a la venta de plástico desde hace 11 años, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra salir adelante, el quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un cuarto en el lugar que muestra la fotografía ya tiene parte de los materiales pero le hacen falta otros, por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compa de cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra asi el su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos y tener una mejor vivienda.
texts.en: Manuel, 41 years old, lives in his own house with his wife and their two daughters. He has worked selling plastic for the past 11 years. With what he gets from his earnings, he manages to get ahead. He wants to improve his house, building a room in the spot shown in the photo; he already has part of the materials but he lacks others. For this reason, he asks for a loan to purchase cement, sand, and pay labor costs so that his family can live more comfortably and have a better house.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 35 years old and married with two children.

Gina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

Gina has borrowed and repaid one loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from pig raising.

Gina aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Rohila

texts.ru: Рохила жизнерадостная женщина 50 лет. Она замужем и имеет 4 детей, но из них двое замужем. У неё высшее образование. Её муж  работает в ГАИ. Рохила 10 лет как занимается продажей молочных продуктов. В хозяйстве есть две дойные коровы, 2 крупно рогатых скота и несколько голов барана. Её сын на заработках в Российской Федерации.  Рохила каждый день продает более 10 литров молока, и за того чтобы молоко не прокисло в жаркое летнее время хочет купить холодильник. Она обратилась в Арванд за кредитом. Она заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en:
Rohila is a cheerful woman. She is 50 years old. She is married and has four children, but two of her daughters are already married. She has a higher education. Her husband works in the State Motor Vehicle Inspectorate. 

Rohila has sold dairy products for ten years. She has two milk cows, two horned cattle, and a few sheep on her farm. Her son works in Russia. 

Rohila sells more than ten litres of milk every day. She wants to buy a refrigerator so that the milk does not go sour during the hot summer months. She has applied to Arvand for a loan. She is thankful in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator

loans.name: Esha

texts.en:
Esha is a married woman, and she has two children, both of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past three years, she has operated  a poultry farming business which earns her other source of income. She sells to restaurant operators and local neighbours. Her major challenges are the high cost of transportation to her place of operation.

With the KES 20,000 she wants to purchase chicken feed and chicks for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business and improve her living standards.

loans.use: to purchase chicken feed and chicks for her business

loans.name: Samina

texts.en:
Samina is 35 years old. Her husband is a young and energetic person living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. He owns a clothing shop, and this clothing shop is the only source of income for his family. For this reason, he devotes all his efforts and time to the garment shop. 

His shop is situated under the clothing market and there are a lot of competitors in the market. Due to this competition, it is very difficult to convince customers to pay a high price. This competition becomes the cause of low sales and more efforts as well. He has to maintain the latest designs, rates, and delightful colors of clothing for his shop so that he can maintain the rate of sales.

Now the major problem is that the summer season is going on and he does not have sufficient cash on hand to buy clothing related to the current weather. He does not want to reduce his sales and his monthly income. 

Therefore, Samina has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband, so that he can be empowered to buy summer season clothing.

Samina hopes that her husband will purchase clothing according to his desire at the right time so he can cope with the market competition and can grow his income as well. He thanks Kiva and its field partner for this support.

loans.use: to help her husband purchase summer season clothing

loans.name: Margarita

texts.ru:
Маргарита молодая и трудолюбивая женщина 30 лет. Она разведённая и  имеет одного ребёнка. Маргарита живёт с родителями. Маргарита многие годы работает маляром штукатуром с мамой,и знает все тонкости в этом деле. Она освоила эту профессию от мамы. 
 Маргарита сотрудничает с МДО Арвандом с 2013 года.  В ближайшее время у её брата намечается свадьба.  Несмотря что у них хороший доход, всё равно им нахватает денежных средств чтобы провести свадьбу брата. Маргарита  обратилась МДО Арванд  Она рада за своевременную помощь и благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en:
Margarita is a young and hardworking woman. She is 30 years old. She is divorced and has one child. Margarita lives with her parents. Margarita has worked as a painter and plasterer with her mother for many years, and she knows all the ins and outs of this job. She has gained mastery of this profession from her mother. 

Margarita has been cooperating with MDO Arvand since 2013. Her brother is planning to get married soon. In spite of their good income, they still do not have enough funds to hold her brother's wedding. Margarita has applied to MDO Arvand. She is happy for your timely help and is thankful for the support.

loans.use: for wedding expenses

loans.name: Marcela

texts.es:
Marcela es una madre de familia de 35 años de edad, es casada tiene una hija de y un hijo de las edades entre 14 y 19 años, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Marcela con el afán de generar sus ingresos y mantener a su familia se dedica a la compra y venta de abarrotes, ella tiene 5 años de dedicarse a este negocio, pero para obtener un poco más de ingresos ella se dedica también a la elaboración de güipiles típicos.
Marcela por ser una persona muy amable tiene muchos clientes, quienes lo visitan constantemente, por esa razón ella quiere surtir mejor su tienda, y para poder hacerlo solicita un préstamo para comprar productos como: golosinas, jugos, gaseosas, arroz, aceite, azúcar.
El gran sueño de Marcela es construir una casa de terraza para vivir con más seguridad y comodidad.
texts.en:
Marcela is mother, 35 years old. She is married and has a daughter and a son between the ages of 14 and 19. This humble family lives in a community in Sololá.

Marcela, with the desire to generate more income and support her family, works buying and selling groceries. She has been doing this work for 5 years, but to get a little more income, she also works making traditional güipiles [tops].

Marcela, as she is a very friendly person, has many customers who visit her constantly. For this reason, she wants to stock her store better, and to be able to do it, she asks for a loan to purchase products such as sweets, juices, soft drinks, rice, oil, and sugar.

Marcela's grand dream is to build a house with a terrace to live more securely and comfortably.

loans.use: to purchase and sell groceries such as candies, juices, soft drinks, rice, oil and sugar.

loans.name: Zebogul'

texts.ru: Эту скромную и ответственную женщину зовут Зебогуль. Зебогуль 52 года. Она замужем и мать четверых прекрасных детей. У нее 2 сыновей, и 2 дочери. Муж находится на заработках загранице. Зебогуль занимается портнихой у себя дома. Она опытная и талантливая швея. Зеброгуль берет заказы на шитье национальной женской одежды. Такой деятельностью она занимается более 10 лет. Она очень любить свою работу и хочет заняться еще много лет. Ей в работе нравится результаты, которых, она в процессе добивается. Зебогуль нравится смотреть на восторженные лица своих клиентов, после того как они надевают заказанные платья. На сегодняшний день швейная машинка Зебогуль не пригодна для использования. И она хочет на деньги от кредита купить новую машинку, чтобы поскорее приступить к работе.
texts.en:
She is a modest and responsible woman, her name is Zebogul’. She is 52 years old, married, a mother of four beautiful kids. She has two sons and two daughters. Her husband is working abroad. 

Zebogul’ is a dressmaker working from home. She is an experienced and talented 
needlewoman. Zebogul’ receives orders to make national women’s clothing. She has been doing this for over 10 years. She loves her work and wants to continue doing it for years to come. She likes the results she has achieved so far. Zebogul’ enjoys watching her clients faces lit up when they put on the ordered dresses. Currently, Zebogul’s sewing machine is out of service. She wants to buy the new one with the borrowed money to get back to work as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy a a sewing machine to promote the business

loans.name: Yesica

texts.es:
Yesica es una joven mujer  de 21 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y estudia la carrera de contabilidad pública.
Ella es inteligente, emprendedora, decidida, comprometida con su trabajo, responsable y muy trabajadora. Sus estudios los realiza en la universidad pública localizada en el centro de la ciudad, caracterizada por albergar a edificios públicos, privados y rodeados de todo tipo de comercio, de clima frío y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 0-12 grados centígrados.
Yesica es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello castaño largo lo usa suelto, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por los estudios que realiza. Su vida la realiza en casa de sus padres que trabajan como fabricantes de zapatos de cholita, y que es propiedad de la familia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Ella estudia la carrera de contaduría pública y se encuentra en último año. Sus cualidades más destacables son la Vocación de servicio a la comunidad, su Capacidad para relacionarse con las personas, su capacidad para trabajar en equipo, muy buena Capacidad de expresión oral y escrita, es Audaz, responsable y objetiva. Se capacita en Contabilidad, Finanzas y Auditoria, para analizar e  Interpretar las gestiones empresariales privadas, públicas y mixtas  internacionales y nacionales. “ya estoy en los últimos trámites para recibir mi título profesional, me siento con muchas ganas de mejorar mi negocio…” comenta.
La ventaja de su profesión es que ayuda en el negocio familiar, la desventaja son los trámites que debe pagar para obtener los títulos. Su sueño es obtener su título profesional y ejercer su profesión, ella desea pagar los gastos de titulación para obtener su título profesional y trabajar en su ramo. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que trabaja y estudia.
Es por esos motivos que Yesica solicita un préstamo para pagar los trámites de titulación para graduarse y ejercer su profesión.
texts.en:
Yesica is a young woman, 21 years old, single, with now children, and she is studying for a public accounting degree. 

She is intelligent, enterprising, dedicated, committed to her work, responsible and very hard-working. She goes to school at the public university located in the center of the city, characterized by housing public and private buildings and being surrounded by all sorts of business, with a cold and dry climate with a temperature that varies during the day between 0-12 degrees centigrade. 

Yesica has dark skin, dark eyes, long brown hair that she wears loose, is short, has a slender physique, her native language is Aymará which she speaks with her family and she speaks Spanish due tho the general culture and for the studies she is undertaking. She has her life in her parents' house, who work making cholita shoes [worn with traditional outfits], which is the family's property and is build of brick and cement, with a roof of metal sheeting, and has drinking water, electricity, gas services and sewer services. She is studying for a degree in public accounting and is in her last year. Her qualities that stand out the most are her vocation to serve the community, her capacity to relate to people, her ability to work in a team, and her very good oral and written expression skills. She is courageous, responsible, and objective. She is training in accounting, finances, and auditing, to analyze and interpret the paperwork of international and domestic, private, public and mixed businesses. "I am in the last stages to get my professional degree, I really want to improve my business..." she says. 

The advantage of her profession that it helps with the family business, the disadvantage are the fees that she has to pay to get her degree. Her dream is to get her professional degree and practice her profession. She wants to pay the expenses to register her degree to get her professional degree and work in this field. This is her second loan cycle with the institution in the 2 years that she has worked and gone to school. 

For these reasons, Yesica asks for a loan to pay the fees to register her degree to graduate and take on her profession.

loans.use: to pay the fees for registering her degree to graduate and take on her profession.

loans.name: Augusto

texts.es:
Augusto es un hombre de 27 años de edad, es casado vive junto a su esposa en una comunidad de Sololá.
Augusto con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia, trabaja como ayudante de albañil  desde hace 15 años, pero para poder superarse mejor su esposa también trabaja en costuras típicas.
Augusto desde hace algún tiempo ha tenido la necesidad de cuatro puertas de su casa, Augusto a pesar de todos sus esfuerzos no le ha sido posible comprar sus puertas, es por ello que ahora solicita un préstamo para  poder adquirirlos.
El gran sueño de Augusto es contar con un negocio de venta de leña y construir una casa mas grande.
texts.en:
Augusto is a 27-year-old married and lives with his wife in a community in Sololá.

Augusto, with the desire to get income and to get his family ahead, has worked as an assistant construction worker for the past 15 years, but to be able to improve themselves better, his wife also works making traditional clothing.

Augusto, for some time, has had the need of four doors for his house. Augusto, despite all his efforts, has not been able to purchase the doors. For this reason he now asks for a loan to be able to get them. 

Augusto's great dream is to have a business selling firewood and to build a larger house.

loans.use: to purchase four doors for his house.

loans.name: Juan Saun

texts.es: Juan es un hombre trabajador de 49 años de edad que vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo de 1 año de edad que es su mayor alegría. Él siempre buscando lo mejor para su familia, se gana la vida desde hace 3 años como motorista de una empresa cercana, actividad que le ha permitido sacar adelante a su familia y tratar de brindar cada día lo mejor a los mismos. La vivienda de Juan no cuenta con un desagüe para las aguas lluvias, por lo que él desea construir una canaleta con tubería para que el agua no siga lavando el piso de su corredor, ya que teme que en este próximo invierno, esto pueda afectar la estabilidad de su vivienda y poder causar un riesgo mayor para su familia, además de evitar la anidación de mosquitos que causa enfermedades a su familia, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: tuberías, cemento, arena y grava para construir un desagüe con tuberías en el patio de su vivienda.
texts.en: Juan is a hard-working man, 49 years old, who lives with his life partner and their 1-year-old child who is his greatest joy. He always seeks the best for his family. For the past 3 years he has earned his living as a driver for a nearby business, work that has allowed him to get his family ahead and try to offer the best to them every day. Juan's house doesn't have a drain for the rain water, so he wants to build a gutter with pipes so that the water doesn't keep washing the floor of his outdoor walkway, since he fears that his next winter this will affect the house's stability and could cause a great risk for his family. In addition, he wants to avoid the mosquito breeding that causes diseases for his family, so he asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in pipes, cement, sand, and gravel to build a drain with pipes in his house's patio.

loans.use: to invest in pipes, cement, sand, and gravel to build a drain with pipes in his house's patio.

loans.name: Madalitso Group

texts.en:
Dorice, 27, is married and has three children. They all go school. 

She supports her family by selling tomatoes, onions and cabbage to people surrounding her community. The profits from the business have been helping her to improve her family’s living standards and to pay school fees for her children. 

She would like to obtain another loan in order to increase her stock. She plans to expand her business further by selling other products such as Irish potatoes and bananas. Since this is only her second loan, she has not experienced much change, but she is now able to provide enough food for her family members.

loans.use: to buy cabbage, onions and Irish potatoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy scrap goods such as scrap iron, aluminum, and plastic bottles for recycling by her son.

loans.name: Mutabar

texts.ru:
Мутабар молодая и трудолюбивая женщина 42 лет. Она родилась и выросла  в городе Истаравшан в семье рабочего.  Она  замужем и имеет троих детей. Её мужа зовут Назир. Мутабар занимается торговлей. Она продает детскую одежду.  У неё чистый доход в месяц составляет 2000-2500 сомон. Мутабар   хорошая спокойная женщина. Она живет  с мужем и детьми в уютном доме. Её  сын в Российской Федерации. Он работает на стройке. 
 Мутабар   хочет расширить свой бизнес. Она обратилась в Арванд за кредитом. Она благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Mutabar is a young and hard-working woman, 42 years old. She was born and raised in the town of Istaravshan in the family of a worker. She is married, with 3 kids. Her husband’s name is Nazir. 
Mutabar is selling children’s clothes for a living. Her net monthly income is about 2000-2500 somoni. Mutabar is a good, quite woman. She lives with her husband and kids in a comfortable house. Her son is in Russia, he works at a construction site.
Mutabar wants to expand her business. She requested a loan through Arvand. She is thanking Arvand for its support.

loans.use: to buy goods for sale

loans.name: Rogers

texts.en:
Mr. Rodgers is aged 38 and happily married with one wife and two children aged 9 and 7. He has no other dependents and all his children are in school. He has applied for a loan of UGX3,000,000 and has been borrowing from UGAFODE Microfinance ltd (MDI) for over five years. He is a principle farmer and mainly does tea farming and banana plantation. He works for 8 hours for a day and 6 days a week.  He also has a side income of retail trade.  He started the business in order to generate income for his family house hold. 

The loan purpose is to buy fertilizers, chemicals and mulches for his plantations. Most of his clients are people around Bushenyi District and tea factories in Kyamuhunga. He started business in 1988. He hopes to own large plantations of tea and produce more for sale. He is always faced with a challenge of price fluctuations and high prices for agricultural inputs.  He is a hard working person.

loans.use: To buy farm fertilizers, chemicals and mulches for his tea plantation and bananas

loans.name: Asia

texts.en:
Asia is 49; she is a mother of one son and three daughters and living in Lahore, Pakistan. Her son, being the eldest wanted to contribute to the family income so he started a part time job with his studies and worked at different places where he could find job but in that routine he couldn't make up much money which he could contribute to the family income .

So he has now decided that after this experience from several places he will work from scratch and take his business a long way. 

So Asia had applied for the loan so that her son could start his scrap recycling business,so to better contribute to his family.He is very hard working man and is very sharp at whatever he does.Asia thanks Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan. Asia hopes that her son will utilize the loan in positive way; this amount will help him to cope with the family demands.she thanks Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy scrap goods for reselling by her son.

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is a married woman with three kids, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Mwanamisi operates a grocery vegetables selling stall, she sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. She faces a challenge of high cost of transportation to her place of operation. 

With the Kshs 10,000 she wants to purchase green vegetables, 2 crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, 2 crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale

loans.name: Nhóm 26 Thôn 9 Quảng Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs Hinh works in agriculture raising livestock. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in the future.

Hinh is 34 years old and she is married with 3 children.  She is the group leader of the Nhóm 26 thôn 9 Quảng Hải solidarity group, which consists of 5 members.   Hinh lives in Quang Xuong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hinh first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.  She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Hinh faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hinh hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in the future, for her business to do well and her children to find good jobs

loans.name: 030805080004.thiệu Toán Group

texts.en:
Bốn works in agriculture raising livestock. She is applying for a loan to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in future.

Bốn is 53 years old and she is married with two children. Bốn is the group leader of the 030805080004.Thiệu Toán solidarity group, which consists of six members. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Bốn joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Bốn has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. Bốn has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Bốn hopes for her business to do well, to buy land of her own, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in future

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 30 year old Lebanese married man with one child. He is the main income provider in the family. He has worked as a plumber for six years. Mohamad at this stage is in real need of a little help from Kiva. 

For that reason, he is requesting for a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to pay his child's educational fees. He said that he is happy that he will be able to enable his child's education suitably.

loans.use: to pay his child's educational fees

loans.name: Annelyn

texts.en:
Twenty-six year old Annelyn  engages in farming. She grows and sells rice.  She is married with three kids ages 1,4 and 6 year old respectively.  Aside from farming, she runs a sari-sari(variety) store. She sells basic commodities like noodles,canned goods, seasonings, cooking oil, eggs, 

She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers for the farm and assorted groceries for the store. These will enhance the content of her store and enable her to increase the yield of her farm. With these, she will be able to provide her family with healthy meals and better shelter to live. 

Annelyn hopes that, her both sources of income would  be productive for her to finance the schooling of all her children to college education for bright future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farm and assorted groceries for her store, to pay for her children's education

loans.name: Mehwish

texts.en:
Mehwish is a 24-year-old married woman. She is a mother two. She is motivated to provide her children with a healthy life and better standard of living.

Her husband is a very hardworking man and has expertise in handling metal. With a small amount of money he is unable to make both ends meet; therefore, he wants to buy a welding plant for manufacturing iron accessories.

Mehwish hopes that he earns well with the support of Kiva and its partner, BRAC. She is thankful to the Kiva team and BRAC.

loans.use: to buy a welding plant for manufacturing iron accessories.

loans.name: Mapingo Group

texts.en:
Hilda is a woman aged 42, married with eight children. She owns a shop in which she sells different kinds of clothing. Hilda buys her clothes from Tanzania which is a neighboring country to Malawi. She runs this business in order to financially support her family and to improve her living standards.

 Hilda has already received and repaid seven short-term loans from the Microloan Foundation. She requested another loan in order to expand her business. She will also use the loan to send her children to school as they dropped out due to lack of school fees. She plans to hire someone to assist her in running her business and hopes to buy a plot of land for her family. Accessing loans has helped her to have adequate food in her household.

loans.use: to buy clothes.
